content: Should the pyDataverse working group have an in-person meeting in Barcelona? Or give a 15 minute talk or have a poster? :thinking: @Jan Range it probably only makes sense if you'll be there but you have a pretty good track record of showing up for community meetings! :smile:
Sure, a talk would be great! I'll talk with my supervisor and once confirmed you can count me in :smile:

@Jan Range should we have an in-person pyDataverse working group meeting in Barcelona? This would be on the pre-conference day (Tuesday, May 12th) and held at the Barcelona Supercomputing Center rather than the main conference venue, the World Trade Center.
